name: Mauro
shortDescription: Passionate about backend development, clean code, solid architecture, and helping devs grow.
longDescription:
.NET Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience building cloud ready, microservice based systems mostly in fintech. I focus on clean architecture, unit testing, test automation, and mentoring devs to grow into confident problem solvers.
Beyond code, I support companies running technical interviews and I mentor mid-to-senior engineers, and helping improve team workflows. I've shared real-world lessons and live demos at conferences across LATAM and Europe.
